DOCNAME: CASE OF IHSAN AND SATUN ONEL v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1 (one applicant);Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient
TEXT: CARDINAL . The General Directorate of the National Water Board expropriated CARDINAL plots of land belonging to the applicants , for the construction of a dam .

CARDINAL . On DATE , following the first applicant ’s request for increased compensation for the plot no . CARDINAL , ORG awarded him MONEY ( TRL ) of additional compensation , plus an interest at the statutory rate , as of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the decision of the first instance court . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE TRL CARDINAL and GPE CARDINAL were paid to the applicant respectively .

CARDINAL .
